safetyTips.title: Digital Safety Tips
safetyTips.description: Protect yourself while seeking help online or through digital resources.

safeDevice.title: Use a Safe Device
safeDevice.description: Use a device that your abuser doesn't have access to when seeking help.

clearHistory.title: Clear Your History
clearHistory.description: Clear your browser history and use incognito/private browsing mode.

safetyPlan.title: Have a Safety Plan
safetyPlan.description: Develop a safety plan for leaving dangerous situations quickly.

tellSomeone.title: Tell Someone You Trust
tellSomeone.description: Let a trusted friend or family member know about your situation.

appDownload.title: Take Safety With You Everywhere
appDownload.description: Download the DESIST app for discreet access to emergency resources, documentation tools, and safety features wherever you go.

importantNotice.title: Important: Your Safety Comes First
importantNotice.content: If you are in immediate physical danger, call 911 immediately. If your internet activity is being monitored, consider using a safer computer or device. Clear your browser history after visiting safety resources.

feedback.title: Feedback & Bug Reports
feedback.description: Help us improve DESIST by sharing your feedback, reporting bugs, or suggesting new features. Your input helps us build better safety tools for everyone.

types.question: What type of feedback are you sharing?

general.label: General Feedback
general.description: Share your thoughts about our website or services

bug.label: Bug Report
bug.description: Report a technical issue or something that isn't working

feature.label: Feature Request
feature.description: Suggest a new feature or improvement

safety.label: Safety Concern
safety.description: Report a safety or security issue

descriptionPlaceholders.bug: Please describe the bug, including steps to reproduce it, what you expected to happen, and what actually happened.
descriptionPlaceholders.feature: Describe the feature you'd like to see and how it would help you or others.
descriptionPlaceholders.safety: Please describe the safety concern in detail. Your report will be handled with priority and confidentiality.
descriptionPlaceholders.general: Share your thoughts, suggestions, or general feedback about our website or services.

email.label: Email Address (Optional)
email.helper: Provide your email if you'd like us to follow up with you about this {type}.

attachments.label: Attachments (Optional)
attachments.helper: Upload screenshots, documents, or other files that might help us understand your {type}.

technical.title: Technical Information
technical.description: This information helps us reproduce and fix technical issues.

privacy.title: Privacy & Safety
privacy.content: Your feedback is important to us. We handle all reports confidentially and in accordance with our privacy policy. For safety concerns, our team will review and respond with appropriate priority. If you are in immediate danger, please contact emergency services directly.

success.title: Thank You!
success.message: Your {type} has been submitted successfully. We appreciate your feedback and will review it carefully.

cta.description: Have questions or need support? Our team is here to help you 24/7.

footer.description: Empowering communities through technology to create safer spaces for everyone. Join us in building a more secure future.

hero.title: About Our Mission
hero.description: We are a community-driven organization dedicated to protecting and empowering marginalized communities through unity, education, and mutual support.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded by community members who recognized the need for organized support and protection, DESIST! has grown into a network of dedicated individuals and organizations working together to create safer spaces for all.
story.paragraph2: We believe in the power of community action, mutual aid, and solidarity. Through education, rapid response networks, and community organizing, we work to protect our neighbors and build stronger, more resilient communities.

unity.title: Unity
unity.description: We stand together, recognizing that our strength lies in our solidarity and mutual support.

education.title: Education
education.description: Knowledge is power. We empower our community through workshops, training, and resource sharing.

action.title: Action
action.description: We take concrete steps to protect and support our community members when they need it most.

community.title: Community
community.description: We build strong, resilient networks of support that celebrate our diversity and shared humanity.

mobile.title: Join the Movement on Mobile
mobile.description: Download our app to stay connected with the community and access resources on the go.

cta.title: Join Our Community
cta.description: Be part of our mission to protect and empower marginalized communities through unity and support.

hero.title: Campaigns & Challenges
hero.description: Join our community-driven campaigns and daily challenges to create a safer, more supportive digital world for everyone.

challenges.description: Complete daily, weekly, and monthly challenges to earn points and badges while making a positive impact in the community.

newsletterSignup.title: Join the DESIST Newsletter
newsletterSignup.description: Get the latest updates on safety features, community stories, and platform news

comingSoon.title: Newsletter Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: The DESIST Newsletter is currently under development and will be launching soon! Subscribe now to get notified when it goes live. We're working hard to bring you the best content about safety, community updates, and platform news.

success.title: Welcome to the Community!
success.description: Thank you for subscribing! You'll receive your first newsletter within 24 hours.

newsletterSignup.privacy: üìã By subscribing, you agree to receive email updates from DESIST. We respect your privacy and will never share your email with third parties. You can unsubscribe at any time.

benefits.title: What you'll get:
benefits.safetyTips: Weekly safety tips and best practices

hero.title: Stealth Mode
hero.description: Protect yourself with discretion. DESIST's Stealth Mode lets you access support and document events without anyone knowing you're using a safety app.

features.title: How Stealth Mode Protects You
features.description: Your safety is our priority. Stealth Mode ensures you can access help and document incidents without putting yourself at additional risk.

hiddenIcon.title: Hidden App Icon
hiddenIcon.description: Disguise the DESIST app to look like a calculator, weather app, or other innocuous utility.

securePin.title: Secure PIN Access
securePin.description: Access your safety tools and resources through a secret PIN that only you know.

panicMode.title: Panic Mode
panicMode.description: Quickly exit to a decoy screen if someone unexpectedly looks at your phone.

quickSwitch.title: Quick Switch
quickSwitch.description: Instantly switch between stealth mode and normal mode based on your safety needs.

emergencyContacts.title: Emergency Contacts
emergencyContacts.description: Access emergency contacts and safety resources even in stealth mode.

noNotifications.title: No Notifications
noNotifications.description: All notifications are disabled in stealth mode to maintain your privacy and safety.

scenarios.title: When to Use Stealth Mode
scenarios.description: Stealth Mode is designed for situations where using an obvious safety app could put you at risk.

workplace.title: Workplace Harassment
workplace.description: Document incidents discreetly while maintaining professional appearances.

domestic.title: Domestic Situations
domestic.description: Access safety resources without raising suspicion in your living environment.

transportation.title: Public Transportation
transportation.description: Report incidents and access help while appearing to use a normal app.

social.title: Social Settings
social.description: Get support and document experiences without drawing unwanted attention.

setup.title: Setting Up Stealth Mode
setup.description: Follow these simple steps to enable and configure Stealth Mode on your device.

download.title: Download the DESIST App
download.description: Install the DESIST app on your smartphone from the App Store or Google Play.

setup.title: Complete Initial Setup
setup.description: Create your account and complete the safety assessment to personalize your experience.

enable.title: Enable Stealth Mode
enable.description: Go to Settings > Privacy & Safety > Stealth Mode and toggle it on.

disguise.title: Choose Your Disguise
disguise.description: Select what type of app you want DESIST to appear as (calculator, weather, etc.).

pin.title: Set Your PIN
pin.description: Create a secure PIN that will be used to access DESIST features in stealth mode.

test.title: Test the Feature
test.description: Practice switching in and out of stealth mode to ensure you're comfortable with the process.

safety.title: Important Safety Considerations
safety.trustInstincts: Trust Your Instincts: If you feel unsafe using any technology, prioritize your immediate safety over documentation.
safety.practiceFirst: Practice First: Familiarize yourself with stealth mode features before you need them in a real situation.
safety.backupPlans: Have Backup Plans: Stealth mode is one tool among many. Always have multiple safety strategies.
safety.stayUpdated: Stay Updated: Keep the app updated to ensure you have the latest security and privacy features.
safety.notice: If you are in immediate danger, call 911 or your local emergency services. Technology tools should supplement, not replace, traditional safety measures.

cta.title: Ready to Get Protected?
cta.description: Download the DESIST app today and take control of your safety with discretion and confidence.

hero.title: DESIST Press Kit
hero.description: Media resources, company information, and brand assets for journalists, partners, and content creators covering DESIST.

companyOverview.title: Company Overview
companyOverview.description: DESIST is a comprehensive anti-harassment platform that combines cutting-edge AI technology with community-driven support to create safer digital spaces. Founded in 2025, we're on a mission to eliminate online harassment through real-time protection, educational resources, and crisis support.

realTimeProtection.title: üõ°Ô∏è Real-time Protection
realTimeProtection.description: AI-powered detection and blocking of harassment across platforms

communitySupport.title: ü§ù Community Support

educationalResources.title: üìö Educational Resources
educationalResources.description: Comprehensive guides on digital safety and harassment prevention

emergencyResponse.title: üö® Emergency Response
emergencyResponse.description: Immediate crisis support and connection to local resources

privacyFirst.title: üîí Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: End-to-end encryption and user-controlled data privacy

crossPlatform.title: üì± Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Seamless protection across web, mobile, and social platforms

betaLaunch.title: DESIST Launches Public Beta with 50,000+ Users
betaLaunch.summary: Anti-harassment platform opens to public after successful closed beta testing.

funding.summary: Funding will accelerate platform development and expand community support programs.

crisisPartnership.title: DESIST Partners with National Crisis Hotlines for Emergency Support
crisisPartnership.summary: Platform integrates direct access to professional crisis intervention services.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security Settings
privacy.deleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all of your data from our servers and sign you out. Note: Your authentication account will remain in the system but will be inaccessible.
privacy.deleteWarning: The following data will be deleted:
